name: ldap-nel
description: üîê Modern web interface for LDAP administration

scripts.build: cd frontend && pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && cd .. && docker build --platform=linux/amd64 -t dethdkn/ldap-nel:latest -t dethdkn/ldap-nel:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") .
scripts.release: pnpm build && bumpp && docker push dethdkn/ldap-nel:latest && docker push dethdkn/ldap-nel:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
